summary: I wake in absolute darkness with no body, no memory of how I got hereâ€”only fragments of a life as a farmer named Howen Ashford. I discover I exist within a farming hoe, trapped in an ancient vault with dormant dangers. Using my innate connection to growing things, I create bioluminescent mushrooms, bringing light to my prison and taking my first steps toward escape.

character_development.howen: From confusion and despair to acceptance and determination. Discovers her power to grow things persists despite her transformation.
